original_text: The Lord will bring upon you and upon your people and upon your father's house such days as have not come since the day that Ephraim departed from Judah—the king of Assyria!”
korean_text: 여호와께서 에브라임이 유다를 떠날 때부터 당하여 보지 못한 날을 너와 네 백성과 네 아버지 집에 임하게 하시리니 곧 앗수르 왕이 오는 날이니라

sentences.original_text: The Lord will bring upon you
and upon your people and upon your father's house
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 네 백성과 네 아버지의 집에도

sentences.original_text: such days as have not come
since the day that Ephraim departed from Judah
